articles.author: Ed Valentine
articles.title: Daniel Jones, Giants are running out of time — franchise tag seems likely - Big Blue View
articles.description: Jones’ agents reportedly leaving Indianapolis with tag deadline looming
articles.content:
It is looking more and more likely that the New York Giants will use the $32.4 million franchise tag to keep quarterback Daniel Jones from entering the free agent market.
NFL insider Tom Pelissero t… [+5065 chars]
